sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都含有"宏伟壮丽的"之意。
means: grand ： 侧重规模大，豪华而宏伟壮丽、盛大。也可指人的崇高、伟大。
magnificent ： 指环境、建筑物等本身的壮丽、堂皇、庄严、崇高或出色等。
majestic ： 侧重状态、外表、仪态等给人以威严感。
splendid ： 指人在行为、品德或性格等方面的卓越超群；指物侧重外观上的辉煌。用于口语中，作"极好的，绝妙的"解。
noble ： 指因本身著名或从外表上看有令人难忘的华丽、庄严、卓越、雄壮或崇高。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"华丽的，宏传的，辉煌的"之意。
means: splendid ： 侧重指给观察者留下壮丽辉煌或灿烂夺目的印象。
gorgeous ： 指色彩的富丽和豪华，有时含炫耀和卖弄意味。
glorious ： 指光芒四射的绚丽，也指值得称倾、赞美或扬名的壮丽辉煌。
superb ： 指壮丽辉煌、宏伟等的极点。
magnificent ： 侧重指建筑物、宝石等的华丽堂皇。

sentence.Network_en: At 54 years old her energy and looks are magnificent.
sentence.Network_cn: 她54岁了，精力和气色都非常好。

sentence.Network_en: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentence.Network_en: It's going to be the most magnificent Thanksgiving dinner we ever had.
sentence.Network_cn: 这将是我们参加过的最盛大的感恩节晚餐。

M开头的英语四级词汇_百度文库 ... magnetic a. 磁的，有吸引力的 magnificent n. 壮丽的；华丽的 maid n. 女佣，女仆；少女.
华字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 华贵〖 luxurious;costly〗 华丽〖 magnificent;gorgeous;flowery〗 华美〖 magnificent;resplendent〗.

list.abs: 在线字典：华字... ... 华侨[ overseas Chinese] 华屋[ beautiful house;magnificent house] 华西[ Sichuan Province;west China].
magnificent是什么意... ... magnificent a1.  壮丽的，宏伟的 the magnificent1. 龙形刁手金钟罩 magnificent time1.  绚丽的时间.
字典中夏字的解释 ... (1) 大[ great] (3) 华彩,即五色[ magnificent color] ◎ 夏 xi&#224.
Character  - Chinese Character... ... 抓举[ snatch] 壮举[ magnificent feat;heroic undertaking] 选举权[ suffrage].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin magnificent- 'making great, serving to magnify', based on magnus 'great'

entry.tran: 宏伟的;壮丽的;令人印象深刻的
entry.def: If you say that something or someone is magnificent, you mean that you think they are extremely good, beautiful, or impressive.

example.ex: ...a magnificent country house in wooded grounds.
example.tran: 绿树掩映中的一幢乡间豪宅

example.ex: ...magnificent views over the San Fernando Valley...
example.tran: 圣费尔南多河谷的壮丽美景

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or attended with brilliance or grandeur;

auth_sentence.content: For me it was a magnificent and elegant goal.
auth_sentence.res_content: For me it was a magnificent and elegant goal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For me it was a magnificent and elegant goal.

auth_sentence.content: It's one of our most magnificent wildlife spectacles.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's one of our most magnificent wildlife spectacles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's one of our most magnificent wildlife spectacles.

auth_sentence.content: One man rode by on a magnificent Turkmen stallion.
auth_sentence.res_content: One man rode by on a magnificent Turkmen stallion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One man rode by on a magnificent Turkmen stallion.

means.word_mean: 壮丽的; 宏伟的; 值得赞扬的

sentences.en: The Taj Mahal is a magnificent building
sentences.cn: 泰姬陵是一座宏伟的建筑。

sentences.en: She looked magnificent in her wedding dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿着婚纱，看上去漂亮极了。

sentences.en: You've all done a magnficent job.

jushi.english: I want to have a magnificent wallet.
jushi.chinese: 我想要一个极好的钱夹。
我们参观了宏伟的教堂。
